channel.title: How could i remove donating?
channel.description: Hey, i am just wondering how i could possibly remove donating points from the Source corby xevolution... because theres a shop and it requires donating points to buy items and i wanna change it to cash, how would i do that?

item.title: How could i remove donating?
item.dc:creator: @conner1 conner_
item.description:
@conner1 wrote:

ShopHandler.java. Towards the bottom there should be a switch/case stmt. that has the shop ID of that shop on it. You’ll be able to tell what the ID is simply by looking at what items are included in it. There is probably an if statement inside that case that checks if the player is a donor or not. Simply delete that.

If all else fails, search ShopHandler.java for “player.donator” (no quotes) and see if an if statement comes up.

Read full topic
